items.title: In Response to New CDC Guidelines, CDPH Recommends Masking for Public Indoor Settings
items.summary:
With more than 90% of the state’s population in areas with substantial or high transmission, the California Department of Public Health recommends universal masking in indoor public settings, regardless of vaccination status. 
						 Read on...

items.title: Counties of Monterey, Napa, San Benito, and Santa Cruz Recommend Indoor Masking in Public Places
items.summary: With cases of COVID-19 rising locally and increased reports of the very infectious Delta variant, the Counties of Monterey, Napa, San Benito, and Santa Cruz recommend that everyone, regardless of vaccination status, wear masks indoors in public places. Ou...
